name: Sites
body:
# My directory of of sites
I'm using this to deploy sites via chef. These are meant to use the [swec](http://hg.suckless.org/swerc/) framework.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
